Mason & Cecilia

do the thing

2:30pm on Saturday, June 16th, 2018
55 Hudson Road West, Irvington NY, 10533

Event Details

We'll be getting married on the lawn (or crowd inside if weather dictates) in an informal, semi-secular, and probably not-entirely-traditional style. Afterward there will be house party revelry with serve-yourself drinks and buffet, games, dancing, and so much merriment. As the hour gets later we'll be moving inside to be respectful to the neighbors.

RSVP

Getting there

2:30pm on Saturday, June 16th, 2018 at
55 Hudson Road West
Irvington, NY, 10533

Getting to the venue: take the shuttle

Please do not Uber / Lyft / cab; the venue is in a private community and drivers have been causing disturbances.

Shuttle pick up times & locations:
- Tarrytown Estate: 1:40pm, 1:50, and 2pm
- Ardsley-on-Hudson Metro-North Station parking lot: 2:06pm

Shuttling back to hotels & train station:
- Every half hour, 8:30pm to 10:30pm
(If you want to leave at a different time, we can help ferry you to the train station.)

Further Information

(Or, "shoot, it's too late to text them and ask this..")

Stay
The Tarrytown Estate (from $190) and the Ardsley Motel (from $90) are the closest hotels, less than a 10 minute drive. See above for shuttle from hotels to house details!

Dress
"Semi-formal", if you want to put a point on it. But really, just feel pretty and be comfortable! We'll be inside and out (weather permitting) and it will likely be warm. Ps, feel welcome to bring a swimsuit. The bride may be jumping in.

Children and Pets
Given the house's rules, this will be an adult-humans only event. If possible, please leave young children & pups with their excited-to-babysit in-laws. Peanut however will be in attendance, if he can get his act together.

Gifts

The main thing we'd like are honeymoon funds so we can take a trip! Our mailing address is 408 S 19th st, Phila PA 19146. We also take payment in dog training because Peanut. (Sorry.)

Alternatively, we're registered at Amazon for the usual lovely bric a brac.

RSVP


Let us know if you can make it!
